name: epa-hsrp-tots
description: Trade-off Tool for Sampling (TOTS) is JavaScript Web Mapping application to create sampling strategy for chemical and radiological contamination characterization easily accessible to field collection applications via the EPA GeoPlatform.
author: USEPA (https://www.epa.gov)

scripts.setup: echo "Installing project dependencies..." && npm ci && echo "Installing client dependencies..." && cd client && npm ci && echo "Installing server dependencies..." && cd .. && cd server && npm ci
scripts.cypress: concurrently --kill-others "npm run server" "npm run client" "cypress open"
scripts.coverage: concurrently --kill-others "npm run server" "npm run coverage_client" "cypress open"
